Vlad Roubtsov wrote:

> I've waited to get some data from others before
> replying. It appears that what I had in mind were
> testcases more functional in nature. 

Indeed, we almost always talk about programmer tests/object tests/unit 
tests in this group. When you're talking about customer tests/functional 
tests/acceptance tests/end-to-end tests, it's best to state so up front. :)

> Of course, the second option hits the usual problem of
> not knowing about reflective and
> Class.forName()invocations... Anyway, I was wondering
> if there was a project tackling this somewhere.

I haven't heard of one, and it would be interesting, but I could never 
trust it, for the very reason you mention here.
